CommandDefinition.Name: removepersistencelayerinstance
CommandDefinition.Description: Removes an existing persistence layer instance.

Argument.Name: persistenceLayerInstanceID
Argument.Description: The ID of the existing persistence layer instance. If not set, 'persistenceLayerInstanceName' is required

Argument.Name: persistenceLayerInstanceName
Argument.Description: The name of the existing persistence layer instance. If not set, 'persistenceLayerInstanceID' is required
